Now Ulzii-Utas is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to buy fibreglass and foam for house insulation. This is so that she and her husband will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned for heating and then less pollutants will be released into the air.

loans.use: to insulate her house in order to reduce coal usage

loans.name: Tukad Kemiri Group

texts.en:
Six months have passed, and Tukad Kemiri group has finished their loan. They had no trouble raising their pigs. Pigs can grow healthy, if they are always given vitamins and nutritious food. Ideal weight can be achieved, and the group members can then sell the pigs at a satisfactory price.

Ni Nyoman raised pigs for pig barbeque. Having maintained the pigs for two months, she sold them at a price per piglet of 400,000 IDR. Ni Nyoman is very happy, because she was able to sell all her piglets. She will continue to raise pigs, to improve the welfare of her family.

The Tukad Kemiri group wants to continue the business, and they agreed to propose a new loan to MUK. Ni Nyoman will use her part of the loan to buy a sow. The sow is expected to give birth every four months, and Ni Nyoman hopes that in the fifth and sixth month, she will be able to sell her pigs. Ni Nyoman hopes she can be independent and continue the business with her own capital, in the future.

loans.use: to buy a sow, which will produce more piglets about every four months

loans.name: Jumelmar

texts.en: Jumelmar is single, and is living in Pagadian City with his family. He wants to become a successful seaman, some day. Because of his dream, he was determined to study well. He became a GDMPC member and borrowed a loan recently. He used the loan to pay his school tuition fees for the first semester, so that he could continue his education. He believes that honesty is the best policy, and that having this attitude will bring him easily to success.

loans.use: to pay his school tuition, so that he can realize his dream of becoming a successful seaman

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, sand and iron.

loans.name: Nhóm 16 - Thôn 1 - Quảng Nhân Group

texts.en:
Tằm is 49 years old, and she is married with one child. Tằm is the group leader of the Nhóm 16 - Thôn 1 - Quảng Nhân solidarity group, which consists of six members. 

Mrs. Tằm works in agriculture raising poultry. Tằm has been involved in this business for five years. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

In 2013, Tằm joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tằm has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Tằm faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tằm hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Nhóm 01, Nhuyễn Sơn, Tượng Lĩnh Group

texts.en:
Ms. Cử works in agriculture, farming rice. Cử has been involved in this business for nine years. The main hardship that Cử faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice seedlings and tools with which to raise rice for future sale.

Cử is 49 years old. She is single and has one child. She is the leader of a three-member group, named the Nhóm 01, Nhuyễn Sơn, Tượng Lĩnh solidarity group.

Cử joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women in 2013, to improve her business. Cử has successfully repaid one previous loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Cử hopes that her children will do well in school, that she will make enough money to provide for her kids, and that her business will do well.

loans.use: to purchase rice seedlings and tools with which to raise rice for future sale.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis esta separado de su esposa y tiene 3 hijos que ya son independientes. Luis vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su madre SE puede decir que Luis vive bien, la casa tiene agua, luz y alcantarillado Luis se gana la vida como tecnico en una empresa telefonica  y necesita un credito urgente para examenes medicos Luis no tiene a quien recurrir puesto que sus hijos tienen sus propios gastos, pero al menos tiene un empleo, lo cual da atisbos de confianza en esta persona
texts.en: Luis is separated from his wife. He has three children who are all independent. Luis lives in La Paz in a house made of brick and cement that used to belong to his mother. You could say that Luis lives well, his house has running water, electricity, and a sewage system. Luis makes a living as a technician for a phone company. He urgently needs this loan to pay for medical exams. He does not have anyone to turn to for help because his children have their own expenses. At least Luis is still working, which gives him glimmers of faith in himself.

loans.use: to pay for medical exams.

loans.name: Nhóm 07, Trung Tâm, Yên Mỹ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lụa works in agriculture, raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry, to raise and sell in future.

Lụa is 38 years old, and she is married and has two children. She is the leader of a 3-member group, called the Nhóm 07, Trung Tâm, Yên Mỹ solidarity group. In 2013, Lụa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women (FPW) to improve her business. Lụa has successfully repaid eight previous loans from FPW. Lụa has been involved in the poultry business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Lụa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Lụa hopes to use her business profit to help her children to do well in school, her family to be healthy and happy, and her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

loans.name: 16-07-03 Đình Hương 2 Đông Cương Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thanh operates a food stall selling soup. She is requesting a loan to purchase food to cook breakfast for sale.

Thanh is 57 years old, married, and has two children. She is the group leader of the 16-07-03 Đình Hương 2 Đông Cương solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Thanh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thanh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to travel for vacation internationally.

loans.use: to purchase food to cook breakfast for sale

loans.name: Andrilita

texts.en:
Andrilita has faithfully paid back her previous loan, which she used for her business. She has been operating her own retailing business for many years, and she earns well from this. She had to work hard, with the determination of having a better income to provide her children with a better education. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort, to provide for their needs.

Andrilta previously used her loan to buy cellphone accessories, and she would like to apply for a new loan to purchase different merchandise items. At an amount of PHP 50,000, she could purchase a greater quantity of household supplies, school supplies, toys, and other products to sell in her business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance, in advance.

In the future, she hopes for her business to grow bigger, and for her family to be always happy and to have sufficiency in everything. She meets up with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.


* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for a greater quantity of household supplies, school supplies, toys, and other products to sell

loans.name: 04 Mộng Tuân1 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Mai has a manufacturing business sewing clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase machines to provide tailor-made and clothing repair services.

Mai is 55 years old, married, and has two children. She is the group leader of the 04 Mộng Tuân1 Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of five members. Mai lives  in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Mai joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Mai has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for five years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Mai hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase machines to provide tailor-made and clothing repair services.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando un hombre de 63 años de verdad de admirar, sale todos los días a recorrer las calles y los alrededores de su barrio diariamente entre 12 y 12 horas sin importar la violencia del sector pero lo más sorprendente de la historia es que lo hace cargando las ollas que podemos ver en las fotos cargadas de mazamorra un producto típico de Antioquia el cual es una bebida a base de maíz. 
Fernando carga dos ollas cargadas las cuales pesan mucho peor sin importarle ya que con este negocio puede mantener as u familia constituida por sus dos hijos y su pareja.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de maíz que es su materia prima, su principal beneficio es que lo comprara en grandes cantidades para obtener un mejor beneficio económico y seguir a pesar de la violencia, a pesar de lo pesado que es cargar su producto, llevando su “mazamorra” a los hogares de Medellín.

Su sueño es poder incrementar sus ventas, tener mayor acogida en los barrios y seguir siendo un apoyo económico, moral para su familia.
texts.en:
Fernando is a 63 years old man who can be admired. He goes out every day to work in the streets of his neighborhood for 10-12 hours each day, despite the violence in his area. The most surprising part of his story is that he does this carrying the pots featured in the photo above full of mazamorra, a typical drink of Antioquia that has a corn base. Fernando carries two large, heavy pots without complaint because this business helps him to provide for his family, which consists of his two children and his wife. 

Fernando is requesting a loan to buy corn, his primary ingredient. The principal benefit of this loan will be that it allows him to purchase the corn in larger quantities so that he can profit more and continue his work, despite the violence around him or the heavy cargo as he brings his mazamorra to homes in Medellín. 

Fernando's dream is to be able to increase his sales, have a better reputation in these neighborhoods, and continue being a moral and financial support for his family.

loans.use: to buy corn to make his product by hand (see photo) 10-12 hours each day.

loans.name: Nhóm 12 Thôn 10 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Mai is 25 years old and she is married with one child. Mai is the group leader of the Nhóm 12 Thôn 10 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of three members. Mai lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoá province.

Mrs. Mai works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

This is Mai's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Mai has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Mai faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Mai hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: 02 Mộng Tuân1, Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà has a manufacturing business sewing clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase cloth and to maintain her machine to provide tailoring services.

Hà is 41 years old, married, and has two children. She is the leader of a three-member group, the 02 Mộng Tuân1, Nam Ngạn solidarity group. Hà lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hà has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for five years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase cloth and to maintain her sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and buy a new bicycle for his son

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
El socio Santos se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura y ganaderia, el socio tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra café y platanos, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Santos continues farming and raising livestock. He has land where he grows coffee and bananas. He works from 8:00 AM until 6:00 PM and has had this business for several years and it is going very well. He dreams of expanding his farming business. He seeks a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. He is happy for the loan and promises to make his loan payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Fortunato

texts.es:
El socio Fortunato se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura y tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia, el socio tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maiz y papa, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Fortunato continue working in agriculture and in his livestock. He has land where he grows corn and potato. He works from 8:00 AM until 4:00 PM. He has had this business for several years and it is going very well. He dreams of expanding his farming. He seeks a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. Fortunato is happy for the loan and promises to make his loan payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Alba Fanny

texts.es:
Alba es una artesa dedicada a la fabricación y comercialización de sandalias para dama y hombre, esta actividad la realiza sola y a pesar de sus largos desplazamientos de su hogar al sitio de trabajo siempre esta puntual para trabajar sus 10 horas diarias

Su empresa lleva poco más 20 años operando y con ella ha brindado estabilidad en su familia que la conforma sus dos hijos y su pareja. 
Alba solicita un crédito para seguir trabajando y tener materia prima para cubrir varios pedidos que tiene pues la temporada de diciembre está próxima y las tienda se andan surtiendo.

Con el crédito comprara telas, hilos y suelas en importantes cantidades para operar y cubrir los pedidos que tiene por parte de sus clientes, por tal razón este crédito es transcendental para ella ya que no cuenta con capital para desembolsarlo de su propio dinero. 

Sus proyectos es diversificar la oferta de productos, seguir dando sostenibilidad en su negocio y seguir con sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Alba is an artisan who makes a living making and selling women's and men's sandals. She does this work alone, and in spite of the large distance of her work site from her home, she always arrives punctually to her 10-hour daily work shift.

Her business has been operating for a little over 20 years, and with it she has provided stability to her family, which is made up of her partner and two children. Alba is requesting a loan in order to continue working and have supplies to fill various orders that she has, since the December season is near and the stores are stocking their shelves.

With the loan, she will buy fabric, thread and soles in large quantities so she can work and fill the orders that she has from her clients. This loan is critical to her because she has no capital to cover these expenses with her own money.

Her plans are to diversify her supply of products, keep sustaining her business, and continue with her life plans.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and soles in large quantities in order to make sandals

loans.name: Dulce Amanecer Maranniyoc Group

texts.es:
La socia Albina pertenece al banco comunal DULCE AMANECER MARANIYOC, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Vilcabamba, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia tiene 47 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al cultivo de frutas como plátanos, naranjas  entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solcito el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales menores, transporte, restaurante.
texts.en:
Albina belons to the Dulce Amanecer Maraniyoc communal bank. The bank is located in Vilcabamba district, Convencion province, Cusco department.

Albina is 47 years old, has 2 children, and is married. She alternates her daily activity with growing fruit such as bananas, oranges, and others. She has had this business for some time and it is going well thanks to the hard work she puts into it every day.

Albina seeks a loan to buy manure and seeds. She is grateful for the loan and promises to make the loan payments.

The other members of the group farm, raise small animals, work in transportation, and restaurant.

loans.use: to buy manure and seeds.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “APU LLALLAHUANI DE KALLACANCHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Kallacancha, perteneciente a la provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Maria se dedica al negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maiz,papa y quinua,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar papa, maíz y quinua.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria belons to the “APU LLALLAHUANI DE KALLACANCHA” communal bank. The bank is located in the Kallacancha district, Paucartambo province, Cusco department.

Maria sells grains. She sells corn, potato, and quinoa. She works from 8:00 AM until 5:00 PM. She has had her business for 4 years and it is going very well. She dreams of having a locale where she can sell her grains.

She seeks a loan to buy potato, corn, and quinoa. She is happy for the loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy potato, corn and quinoa

loans.name: Cinthia Arelis

texts.es:
La  joven  Cinthia  de 23 años de edad es casada no tiene  hijos  que dependen de ella vive en Nacaome, valle al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y vive con su esposo y se dedica desde hace 5 años a la venta de ropa como ser pantalones, blusas, camisas, ropa interior y perfumes, su venta es con los amigos y personas que le conocen. 
Cinthia está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de  blusas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas, camisas, etc. con el apoyo del préstamo  pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su negocio.
Su sueño es mejorar su casa y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Octubre del 2014.
texts.en:
Young Cinthia is 23 years old and married with no dependent children.  She and her husband live in their own home in Nacaome, a valley in the south of Honduras.  She has made a living for 5 years selling clothing such as pants, blouses, shirts, underwear, and perfume.  She sells to her friends and people who she knows.  

Cinthia is asking for a loan to buy blouses, pants, dresses, skirts, and shirts, among other things.  With the support of this loan, she intends to bring in more revenue and improve her business.  Her dream is to improve her home and her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras
October 2014

loans.use: to buy blouses, pants, dresses, skirts, shirts and other clothing, for her business

loans.name: Nhóm 05 Thôn Trung - Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lực operates a food stall, selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

Lực is 27 years old, and she is married and has two children. Lực is the group leader of a three-member solidarity group, called Nhóm 05 Thôn Trung - Quảng Nham.

This is the first loan for Lực with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women (FPW). Lực has been involved in the fish-selling business for five years. The main hardship that Lực faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Lực hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell.

loans.name: Miramkul

texts.ru: Майрамкул 42 года, замужем, мать 5 детей, все активно помогают по хозяйству. У Майрамкул средне-специальное образование, сельским хозяйством занимается с 2000 года. На сегодня в хозяйстве есть 6 коров, 1 лошадь. Также на 12,5 Га арендованной и 0,40 Га собственной земли Майрамкул с семьей выращивают картофель, зерновые культуры и эспарцет для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход Майрамкул составляет в среднем 15,000 сом (KGS). Майрамкул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья и объемов реализации молока. Доходы от кредита Майрамкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и накопить средства на постройку дома для ее большой и дружной семьи.
texts.en:
Miramkul is 42 years old, married, and the mother of five children who are all very active in helping her with the farm work.  She has a specialized-secondary education, and she has been involved in agriculture since 2000.  She currently owns six cows and one horse.  She and her family also use 12.5 hectares of leased land as well as 0.4 hectare of their own land to grow potatoes, cereals and sainfoin for their own domestic use and also for resale.  Miramkul makes an average monthly income of 15,000 som (KGS).

Miramkul has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy additional livestock in order to increase her cattle headcount and the volume of milk that she produces and sells.  Miramkul plans to reinvest the earnings from her loan into further developing her farming business.  She would also like to save enough money to build a house for her large and friendly family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her cattle headcount as well as her production volume of organic milk.

loans.name: Antonio Mario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “APU LLALLAHUANI DE KALLACANCHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Kallacancha, perteneciente a la provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Antonio Mario  se dedica al negocio de venta de cereales, el socio vende maiz,papa y quinua, el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el socio ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar papa, maíz y quinua.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Antonio belongs to the “APU LLALLAHUANI DE KALLACANCHA” communal bank. The bank is located in the Kallacancha district, Paucartambo province, Cusco department.

Antonio sells grains. He sells corn, potato, and quinoa and through this business he hopes to be able to get ahead.He has had this business for 5 years and it is going very well. He dreams of having a locale where he can sell the grains.

Antonio seeks a loan to buy potato, corn, and quinoa. He is happy for the loan and promises to make the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy potato, corn, and quinoa.

loans.name: Cristian Alberto

texts.es:
Cristian es un hombre de 20 años con gran valentía y coraje que decidio venir a la ciudad de Medellín a enfrentarse solo contra las citadinos yya que no tiene ningún familiar o alguna persona en quien refugiarse.

Quiere iniciar su propio negoico de cerrajería pues vino a está ciudad a buscar mejores oportunidades y salir de la pobreza y ha encontrado en la corporación interactuar su gran aliado pues le facilitara una suma para inicair su negocio y trabajar que a eso vino pues tiene unos padres y familiares por los cuales velar y cuidar. 

El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de herramienta como soldadores, cortadoras y herramientas de mano como martillo, destornilladores, alicates etc. También comprara hierro que es su materia prima y espera a tener éxito en su aventura en Medellín y consolidarse como un gran cerrajero de confianza para sus vecinos y toda persona que llegue solicitando su servicio.

Su sueño es tener buena estabilidad económica, traerse a su padres a vivir con él y comprar una casa con sus propios esfuerzos.
texts.en: Cristian is a brave and courageous 20 year old man, who decided to come to the city of Medellin to face his city life alone because he does not have any family nor any person to support him. He wants to start his own locksmith business, because he came to this city to look for better opportunities and come out of poverty. He has found a great ally in Interactuar, who will give him a loan to start his business and find work. This was the reason why he moved because he has his parents and relatives to take care of and support. He will use the loan to buy tools such as welding machines, cutters, and other hand tools such as hammers, screwdrivers, pliers, etc. He will also buy iron, which is his raw material, and he hopes to be successful in his Medellin adventure and to establish himself as a great locksmith for his neighbors and anybody else asking for his services. His dream is to have financial stability, bring his parents to live with him and buy a house with his hard work.

loans.use: to start a locksmith business.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en:
Valeriana is a 58-year-old mother, who has been gifted with five adult-aged children. She supports her husband in gaining income to meet the needs of their family. In addition to farming, they operate their motorcycle transport to sell fruits and vegetables, for an additional source of income.

To continuously operate their motorcycle, they need PHP 10,000 in additional capital. They will use it to buy gasoline, motorcycle parts, accessories for the motorcycle, and vegetables to resell. Valeriana hopes that she will succeed in her loan request, which would enable her to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, motorcycle parts, accessories for the motorcycle, and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Nabonswende Group

texts.fr:
Mme KADIDIA est la représentante du groupe NABONSWENDE. Elle se porte très bien. Marié, elle est mère de 03 enfants, le plus âgé a 10 ans et le moins âgé a 02 ans. 01 vont à l’école. Elle  a 03 personnes en charge.
Madame est commerçante depuis 09 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants. Ses clients sont les habitants de son quartier.
Elle  veut s’acheter 20 complets de pagnes, 10 complets de bazins, 10 habits pour fille.
Mme KADIDIA veut épargner ses bénéfices  et réinvestir dans l’activité. Elle ambitionne ouvrir une boutique de vente de prêt à porter et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Madame Kadidia is the representative of the Nabonswende group. She is in good health. She is married and the mother of three children between the ages of 2 and 10. One of her children goes to school. She has three total dependents.  

She has been a shopkeeper for nine years. She buys her supplies in the neighboring markets. Her clients are neighborhood residents. 

She would like to buy 20 pagne (traditional wrap around) outfits, 10 bazin (damask) outfits, and 10 girls' outfits. 

Madame Kadidia would like to save her profits and reinvest in her business. She would like to open a boutique for ready-to-wear items and help meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: buy 20 "pagne" outfits, 10 "bazin" outfits, and 10 girls' outfits.

loans.name: Ana Mirian

texts.es:
Ana de 44 años de edad, es ama de casa y alcanzo a estudiar hasta el 2° grado, no continuo sus estudios debido a la pobreza en que vivían sus padres y pues decidieron mejor enseñarle a trabajar para que les apoyara en los gastos de la casa, estuvo casada y junto con su esposo tuvieron 4 hijos de 23, 21, 18 y 16 años de edad, luego él decidió alejarse del hogar abandonando a su esposa con sus hijos, ahora Ana solo vive con 2 de sus hijos que son los que están estudiando, por lo tanto son los que dependen de ella, y los otros dos trabajan por sus propios medios ya que decidieron acompañarse y tener sus propios hogares.

 Ana se dedica a la ganadería, crianza de pollos de engorde y a la crianza de cerdos, desde hace mas de 20 años, trabajo que decidió aprender de su madre y por la necesidad de darle a sus hijos una mejor alimentación y una mejor calidad de vida, para llegar a su trabajo Ana camina 2 kilómetros trabajando en un horario de 7:00 am a 4:00 pm. Sin descansar un día a la semana.

 El préstamo que se esta solicitando en la institución de CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 3 terneritas donde espera en un periodo de un año tener mas ganancias y con eso ella podrá darle a su grupo familiar una mejor calidad de vida y poder comprarle a sus hijos lo que sea necesario.El sueño de Ana es, tener en un futuro mas cerdos y pollos de engorde, comprar 2 vacas lecheras y construir una casa de ladrillo ya que en la que se encuentran viviendo es de adobe y esta en mal estado.
texts.en:
Ana is 44 years old, is a housewife, and completed a second grade education. She wasn't able to continue her education due to the poverty of her parents so they decided to teach her how to work in order to help support the household. She married and with her husband has four children ages 23, 21, 18 and 16. He husband decided to leave home, abandoning his wife and children. Now Ana lives with two of her children who are in school studying and still dependent upon her. The other two work to support themselves and their families, and are independent. Ana has raised livestock for over 20 years, raising chickens and pigs. She learned this work from her mother, and out of necessity to provide food and a better quality of life for her children. Ana walks two kilometers to work, working 7 AM to 4:PM. She works every day of the week.

The loan she seeks from CREDICAMP is to buy three young pigs that over the period of a year will have more income and with that she will be able to give to her family a better quality of life and be able to buy her children what they need. Ana dreams of having more pigs and chickens to raise in the future, of buying two milk cows, and building a brick home as her current home is made of adobe and is in bad shape.

loans.use: to buy three young pigs.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El señor  Walter de 30 años de edad es soltero, no tiene  hijos  que dependen de él, vive en Nacaome, valle al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 2 años  a la venta de leña y ropa por temporada.
Don Walter es un hombre trabajador con deseos de salir adelante sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos y también los compañeros de trabajo ya que también tiene un empleo.
Está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de leña seca y también pantalones jeans ya que viene la época donde vende bastante con sus compañeros de trabajo, su sueño es mejorar su casa y su negocio. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras- Octubre del 2014.
texts.en:
Walter is 30 years old, cingle, doesn't have any children, and lives in Nacaome, in southern Honduras. He has his own house. For 2 years he has been selling firewood and seasonal clothing. Walter is a hard-working man with the desire to succeed. His customers are friends, neighbors, and colleagues from work as he also has a job. He seeks a loan to buy dry firewood and also jeans pants as in the upcoming season he sells quite a bit to his work colleagues. His dream is to improve his house and business.
San Lorenzo, Honduras- October 2014.

loans.use: to buy firewood and pants for his business.

loans.name: Oscar Alexander

texts.es:
Oscar de 23 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive con su madre y la apoya económicamente ya que su padre los abandono cuando apenas tenía 7 años de edad, dejándolo a responsabilidad de sus madre y que por dificultades económicas no pudo ponerlo a estudiar.

Oscar es empleado, tiene 7 años trabajando en un lavado de autos, gracias a unos amigos aprendió el oficio y con lo que le pagan puede mantener a su madre.

El préstamo será utilizado para ayudar a su madre, necesita comprar unos medicamentos y son muy costosos. Oscar planea con lo poco que gana ahorrar lo suficiente y con ayuda de la institución mejorar su casa, además quiere trabajar la tierra para mejorar sus ingresos de alguna manera.
texts.en:
Oscar, 23, is single and has no children. He lives with his mother and supports her financially, since his father abandoned them when he was only 7 years old. This left his mother responsible for him, and due to financial difficulties she could not send him to school.

Oscar is employed. He has been working at a car wash for 7 years. He learned to do this work thanks to some friends, and with what he is paid he is able to support his mother.

The loan will be used to help his mother. She needs to buy some medicine and it is very expensive. Oscar plans to save enough of what little he earns, and with the help of the institution, improve their house. He also wants to work the land in order to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy medicine

loans.name: Las Chaskas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS CHASKAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma ella es soltera y tiene 56 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva platanos, cafe, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: The members belong to the communal bank “LAS CHASKAS”. This bank is located in the district of Santa Ana, belonging to the province of La  Convencion and the department of Cusco. Irma is single. She is 56 years old and has 3 children. She has a business cultivating fruits. She has a plot of land where she cultivates bananas, coffee, mandarins and oranges. She works from 6:00 a.m until 5:00 p.m. She has many years in this business and it is going well. Her dream is to have more land. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. The other members work selling animals, selling clothing, have a grocery store and have a food business. Irma is grateful to those who form part of this dream and through this means she promises to meet her loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Yocasta Magaly

texts.es: La innovación y el diseño fueron los componentes necesarios para que Yocasta decidiera estudiar Mercadotecnia. Cursa el cuarto año de la carrera en la UNAN-León, tiene 21 años de edad y esta soltera. Escogió la carrera porque es innovadora y esta le abrirá las puertas al éxito. Yocasta necesita el crédito para comprar una cámara y una computadora para lograr así culminar sus estudios con éxito y lograr realizar todas las tareas propuestas por sus maestros. Su meta próxima es terminar su carrera y ser una egresada de éxito. Este crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá manejar de una mejor manera las herramientas del diseño en su computadora. Su plan futuro es crear su propia empresa de publicidad.
texts.en:
Innovation and design were the two necessary components that made Yocasta decide to study marketing. She is in the fourth year of her degree at UNAN-León. She is 21 years old and single. She chose this major because it is innovative and this will open doors to success. Yocasta needs the loan to buy a camera and a computer, in order to finish her studies successfully and do all of the homework assigned by her professors. 

Her next goal is to finish her degree and be a successful graduate. This loan will be very helpful to her, since she will be able to better manage design tools on her computer. Her plan for the future is to create her own advertising company.

loans.use: to buy a camera and a computer

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es: Maria de 33 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella posee un taller de estructuras metálicas tiene 6 años de realizar esta actividad y ha tenido buenos resultados, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hierro, laminas, metal, electrodos, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old and lives with her partner and her 3 children in her own home. She owns a workshop for metal workings. She has been working in this activity for 6 years, and has had great results. She has a lot of customers due to her good work.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy iron, galvanized sheeting, metal, welding electrodes, etc. This way she will be able to have better revenues.

loans.use: to buy iron, galvanized sheeting, metal, welding electrodes, etc.

loans.name: Shirley Janneth

texts.es:
Shirley es una mujer de 25 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de 5 años y una hija de 2 años, y su negocio es la venta de juguetes.
Ella es emprendedora, buena madre, constante, independiente, responsable y trabajadora. Su labor la realiza en la zona ’16 de julio’ un sitio caracterizado por el comercio en todas las áreas y por su feria los días jueves y domingo; dónde se puede encontrar desde un alfiler hasta un tractor.
Shirley es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el español y conoce el aymara por herencia familiar. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al transporte y sus dos hijos, todos viven en la casa de su madre y cuentan con servicios básicos como agua y luz. Su negocio es la venta de juguetes; para bebés, para niños/as, educativos y para todas las edades. Ella oferta los juguetes en un puesto de venta propio, su negocio lo heredó de su suegra que anteriormente realizaba el mismo trabajo en el mismo lugar, antes de eso ella era ama de casa. Su principal dificultad es que su puesto de venta es a la intemperie y toda su mercadería se encuentra expuesta a los cambios climáticos como el sol y la lluvia. Ya lleva un año de experiencia en este negocio y éste es el primer préstamo que solicita. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio para generar mejores beneficios económicos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, ella desea realizar una inversión en la compra de juguetes por mayor.
Es por esos motivos que Shirley solicita un préstamo para la compra de juguetes por mayor y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Shirley is a 25-year-old woman. She lives with her partner, and has a five-year-old son and two-year-old daughter. Her business sells toys. She is entrepreneurial, a good mother, constant, independent, responsible and hard-working. She works in the "16 de julio" (July 16) zone, which is characterized by the businesses it has in all areas, and its fairs on Thursdays and Sundays, where one can find anything from a pin to a tractor.

Shirley is dark-skinned, with medium build and long black hair. Her native language is Spanish and she knows Aymara due to her family heritage. Her life is shared with her children and her partner, who makes a living in transportation. They all live in her mother´s house and have basic services such as water and electricity. 

Her business sells toys for babies, boys and girls, educational toys and toys for all ages. She sells these toys from her own sales stand, which she inherited from her mother-in-law, who previously did the same work in the same place. Previously, she was a housewife. Her primary challenge is that her sales booth is outside and all of her merchandise is exposed to climate changes, such as sunlight and rain. 

She has a year of experience in this business and this is the first loan she is requesting. Her dream is to expand her business to generate greater financial benefits and improve her family´s quality of life. She wishes to make an investment in the purchase of wholesale toys. Thus, Shirley is requesting a loan to buy wholesale toys and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy wholesale toys and expand her business

loans.name: Milagro Orfilia

texts.es:
Milagro de 49 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudio hasta el 9° grado, no continuo sus estudios debido a los recursos económicos, entonces mejor decidió trabajar para ayudar en los gastos de la casa, esta soltera pero es madre de 4 hijos de 24, 21, 18 y 16 años de edad, de los 4 solo dos viven con ella uno esta estudiando y el otro trabaja para apoyarla en los gastos de alimentación, los otros 2 ya están acompañados.  

 Milagro vive con sus dos hijos y su madrecita. Es una mujer muy trabajadora ya que es empleada en el ingenio una empresa que se dedica a moler caña, desde hace mas de 5 años, decidió trabajar en esto por la necesidad ya que no tenia otros ingresos para los gastos, para llegar a su trabajo Milagro viaja en bicicleta 3 cuadras y labora en el horario de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando en la institución, es para la compra de lamina y tubos para construir un corredor en su casa donde guarda leña para cocinar sus alimentos, ya que ahorita se le esta mojando porque esta deteriorado. El sueño de Milagro es comprar una motocicleta para su hijo, ya que por el momento el viaja en bus.
texts.en:
Milagro is 49 years old, a housewife, and completed a 9th grade education. She didn't continue her education due to her family's poverty, so decided to work to help with the household expenses. She is single and the mother to 4 children ages 24, 21, 18 and 16. Two live with her, one is in school, and the other works to support her in providing food for the family. The other two are married.

Milago lives with her two children and her mother. She is a very hard-working woman, has been employed in a business that mills cane for more than 5 years. She decided to work as she didn't have any other income. In order to arrive at work Milagro travels by bicycle 3 blocks and works from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM.

The loan she seeks is to buy sheet metal and pipes to build a place in her house to store firewood she uses to cook her food, as right now it is getting wet and deteriorating. Milagro dreams of buying a motorbike for her son because as of the moment he travels by bus.

loans.use: to buy pipes and sheet metal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy threads, fabrics, needles, buttons and everything she needs for sewing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to sow beans

loans.name: María De La Paz

texts.es:
María de 55 años de edad, es ama de casa y se dedica a la crianza de especies menores como pollos y cerdos, a la siembra de hortalizas como tomates, chile verde, pipianes y pepinos, a la agricultura siembra de maíz y también le ayuda a veces a su esposo en la ganadería, estos trabajos los realiza desde hace mas de 10 años, trabajos que aprendió de sus padres quien siempre se dedicaban a este oficio, para llegar a su trabajo María camina 2 kilómetros, trabajando en un horario de 7:00 am a 4:00 pm todos los días.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es, para la compra de una vaca lechera con esa tendrá tres, así lograra tener mas leche, por lo tanto podrá obtener un poco mas de ingresos donde espera darle a su grupo familiar una mejor alimentación.

El sueño de María es poder ayudarle a su hijo económicamente para que estudie mucho y así en un futuro podrá tener mejores posibilidades de un buen trabajo donde pueda defenderse por si mismo y ahorrar mucho para comprar un vehículo para que su hijo pueda viajar a su centro de estudio.
texts.en:
María, 55, is a housewife and makes a living raising small animals such as chickens and pigs, and sowing vegetables such as tomatoes, green peppers, squash, cucumber and corn. Sometimes she also helps her husband with the cattle. She has been doing this work for more than 10 years. She learned to do it from her parents, who always made a living doing this work. To arrive to work, María walks two kilometers, working from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm every day.

The loan she is requesting is for the purchase of a dairy cow. With this one, she will have three, and will be able to have more milk, which will allow her to obtain a bit more income, with which she hopes to give her family better nutrition.

María´s dream is to be able to help her son financially, so that he can study a lot and in the future and have a better chance at a good job, where he can fend for himself and save a lot to buy a vehicle, so that his son can get to school.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow, with which she will have three cows and more milk

loans.name: Zulma Esmaralda

texts.es:
Zulma de 31 años de edad, está acompañada, su esposo es agricultor  y tienen 2 hijos de 9 años de edad y 4 años de edad, vive en casa de su tía desde muy pequeña porque sus padres no la apoyaron y fue ella quien se hizo cargo de Zulma.

Zulma es comerciante tiene 3 años de dedicarse a la venta de panes, con su esposo trabajando en lo suyo ambos mantienen la casa para darle lo básico y necesario a su familia.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar un nuevo puesto ambulante (Carretón) para vender sus panes, el que tiene actualmente está  muy deteriorado y se le dificulta ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes.

Zulma planea comprar un vehículo y así trasladar su carretón hasta el puesto de venta, muchas veces se le dificulta llevarlo por no encontrar vehículo que le haga el viaje, cuando tenga el suyo también piensa ir a otros lugares para vender, así aprovechar eventos y ferias locales.
texts.en:
Zulma is 31 years old and married. Her husband is a farmer and they have two children ages 9 and 4. She lives in her aunt's very small house because her parents couldn't support her so her aunt took her in. Zulma is a vendor and has been selling bread for 3 years. With her husband working also they can support their home and provide the basic needs for their family.

The loan she needs is to buy a new portable cart to sell bread. The one she has is in poor condition and it is difficult to offer good service to her customers. Zulma plans to buy a vehicle to move the cart to the point of sale as it is difficult to take it when she can't find a vehicle to make the trip. When she has her own vehicle she can take the cart to various places to sell, taking advantage of local events and markets.

loans.use: to buy a portable sales cart.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: Dora de 32 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos en las edades de 8 a 13 años, que son el motor de su vida y trabaja persistentemente con el fin de lograr el desafio de tener su propia vivienda. Su experiencia en el negocio de elaboración y venta de comidas, data de hace 3 años, cuando por iniciativa de un familiar, quien le brindó apoyo y asesoria en el montaje de su pequeño restaurante,  decidió apoyada por su cónyuge iniciar vendiendo comidas entre sus vecinos. Poco a poc su negocio ha ido creciendo pero su infraestructura no. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a unc redikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará una nevera, 8 sillas y 2 mesas, además de una olla de mayor tamaño, para responder a su clientela, que todos los dias crece y tambien para lograr la conservación de los productos alimenticios, los cuales debe comprar permanetemente, aumentando sus costos, así como tambien  ve disminuída su capacidad productiva. Con esta inversión mejjorará las debilidades mencionadas y esto es justamente el éxito de su creikiva.
texts.en:
Dora is 32 years old, and is the mother of three children between the ages of 8 and 13. Her children are a driving force in her life and she works persistently with the intent to reach her goal of having her own home. Her experience in the food production and sales business dates back 3 years to when at the initiative of a family member that brought her support and advice, she started her small restaurant.

She was supported by her partner, and decided to start selling food to her neighbors. Little by little her business has grown, but her infrastructure has not. This is the reason she is requesting a loan, her first financing provided through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Through the loan she will buy a fridge, 8 chairs and 2 tables, as well as a bigger sized pot to serve her customer base that grows every day. She will also use these to preserve the food products which she has to buy consistently. This increases her costs as well as decreases her productive capacity. With this investment, she will improve on the weaknesses mentioned, and this is exactly the success of her loan.

loans.use: to buy a fridge, 8 chairs and 2 tables, as well as a bigger sized pot.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en: From Tipolo, Plaridel, Philippines, Delia earns a living through her clothing sales. She strives to have enough inventory to continuously provide for her family. For her capital needs, PMPC stood by her since the start of her business. She is happy that she is able to survive the odds of running a business, with determination and her family as her inspiration. To earn more, she applied for a loan to purchase more clothing to sell. She hopes to live comfortably with her family and help in supporting her grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell and earn more income.

loans.name: 12 Tiền Phong, Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Huệ works in agriculture, raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise for future sale.

Huệ is 41 years old and she is married with two children. She is the group leader of the 12 Tiền Phong, Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of three members. Huệ lives with two dependents in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Huệ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for five years, and the main hardship that Huệ faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise for future sale.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is responsible and dedicated to her clothing sales business. This is her only source of income and she is very grateful for her life and being allowed to be independent. This business has given her the opportunity to work and survive. She applied for a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase more clothing to sell and attract more people to buy clothes. This will allow her generate more income and be able to save money for a house renovation.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing to sell and attract more people to buy clothes.

loans.name: Nhóm 01-Phố 10-Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên operates a small restaurant selling rice noodle. She is requesting a loan to purchase more noodles, and tools for cooking breakfast to sell.

Liên is 52 years old and she is married with one child. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 01-Phố 10-Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Liên has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years and the main hardship that Liên faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Liên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more noodles and tools for cooking breakfast to sell.

loans.name: Nhóm 03 Thôn 10 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Giang works in agriculture, raising pigs. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.  

Giang is 29 years old and she is married with three children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 03 Thôn 10 Quảng Lưu solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

In 2013, Giang joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Giang has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years, and one of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Giang hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Thôn 10 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Tuyết works in agriculture, raising poultry. She is applying for a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise for future sale.

Tuyết is 41 years old and she is married with two children. Tuyết is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 Thôn 10 Quảng Lưu solidarity group, which consists of six members. 

In 2013, Tuyết joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Tuyết has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tuyết has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tuyết hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise for future sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tropical fruits, pears, mandarins and avocados.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en: Elsie is a 40 year old mother from Eastern Looc, Plaridel, Philippines. Her husband is a fisherman. They have a small fishing boat and they earn a living through fishing. She personally sells their catch in the market. She became a member of Paglaum MPC and appreciates the programs and services of the Co-op. She wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to PHP 5,000 for the purchase of new nets, foam and other fishing accessories. As much as possible, she has to have all the needed fishing accessories to minimize the chances of a low or zero catch. She also wants to buy the fish catch from her neighbors so she can sell more fish to the nearby fish market, where she will fetch higher prices. In the future, she dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat by setting aside some savings from the daily sales. She wishes to see her children finish their college education and have stable jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets, foam and other fishing accessories to maximize the fish catch.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming materials such as seed, fertilizer, poison and labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition for her youngest daughter.

loans.name: Luís Alonso

texts.es:
Luís de 40 años de edad, es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo, es agricultor, estudio hasta el 6° grado no continuo sus estudios debido al conflicto armado sus padres ya no quisieron que siguiera estudiando, esta casado y junto con su esposa tiene 3 hijos de 17, 16 y 14 años de edad, sus 2 hijas se encuentran estudiando y uno ya decidió trabajar por sus propios medios porque ya esta acompañado.

 Luís se dedica a la agricultura, siembra maíz desde hace 30 años, trabajo que decidió aprender por la necesidad económica y también gracias a su padrastro, también se dedica a la albañilería que lo aprendió de un amigo, para llegar al terreno donde siembra maíz Luis camina 2 kilómetros trabajando en el horario de 7:00 am a 4:00 pm.

El crédito que esta solicitando es para, tramitar la escrituración de la casita donde vive ya que por el momento no tiene una escritura donde diga que la propiedad es de él.

 Luís sueña con mejorar su vivienda, ayudar a sus hijas económicamente para que puedan sacar una carrera universitaria y comprar un vehículo para poder trasportar las herramientas de albañilería.
texts.en:
Luís, 40, is very dedicated to his work as a farmer. He studied until 6th grade and wasn't able to continue because due to the armed conflict his parents did not want him to go to school anymore. He is married and he and his wife have three children, ages 17, 16 and 14. His two daughters are in school and one son decided to start working to make a living because he has a partner.

Luis has been farming corn for 30 years, work that he learned out of economic necessity, with help from his stepfather. He is also a mason, a trade that he learned from a friend. In order to get to his corn fields, Luis walks 2km. He works from 7am to 4pm.

He is asking for a loan to process the deed for his house because he does not currently have written proof of ownership of the property. Luis dreams of improving his home, helping his daughters financially so that they can graduate from college, and buying a vehicle to help transport his masonry tools.

loans.use: to process the deed for his house since he currently doesn't have a paper proving ownership.

loans.name: Angel Saul

texts.es:
Ángel tiene 34 años de edad  de estado civil casado vive con sus hijos de 15, 17 y 12 años en el cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar, en la comunidad Nueva Esperanza.
Es integrante de la ventanilla Rural Cooperativa Curi-Ñan  se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva esperanza, esta se dedican a las labores agrícolas y pecuarias.
Ángel se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz, papas y trigo. Solicita el crédito para la compra de abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, urea, fungicida y para su mantenimiento para sembrar papas. La compra lo realiza en Guaranda. Su meta es aumentar la siembra y comprarse una casa. Su desafío es las enfermedades en los sembríos. En su tiempo libre le gusta ver la televisión y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Angel, 34, is married and lives with his children ages 17, 15 and 12 in the community of Nueva Esperanza in the canton of Guaranda in Bolivar province. He is a member of the rural cooperative Curi-Ñan, located in Nueva Esperanza, whose members work in agriculture and livestock.

Angel is a farmer, planting corn, potatoes and wheat. He asks for a loan to buy compost, insecticide, fertilizers, urea, fungicide and other things needed to maintain his potato crop. He will purchase these items in Guaranda.

His goal is to increase his planting and to buy a house. He faces challenges like diseases that affect his crops. In his free time he likes to watch television and play sports.

loans.use: to plant potatoes.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar es soltero, no tiene hijos y vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler, al menos la vivienda tiene luz, agua y alcantarillado. Edgar se gana la vida como empleado de seguridad, por lo que se somete a muchas horas de trabajo Como ya se acercan las fiestas de fin de año, Edgar quiere un credito para comprar juguetes y aumentar sus ingresos por esas fechas para inicar con mejor situacion el proximo año Edgar no tiene a quien acudir, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Edgar is single and does not have any children. He lives in La Paz in a rental house made of cement and brick. His home has electricity, water and a sewage system. Edgar works as a security guard, which requires many hours of work.

Since the end-of-year holidays are approaching, Edgar would like a loan to buy toys which he will use to augment his income this season. This way he can begin the new year in a better financial situation. Edgar doesn't have anyone to turn to, which is why he needs your help.

loans.use: to buy toys to sell for Christmas.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es:
Pascual  tiene 50 años de edad  de estado civil casado vive con su esposa e hijos de 18, 15 y 16 años en el cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar, en la comunidad Nueva Esperanza.
Es integrante de la ventanilla Rural Cooperativa Curi-Ñan  se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva esperanza, esta se dedican a las labores agrícolas y pecuarias.
Pascual se dedica a la agricultura, a la cría de ganado. Solicita el crédito para la compra de ganado para criar. Su meta es aumentar su negocio de ganado. Su desafío es las enfermedades. En su tiempo libre le gusta ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Pascual, 50, is married and lives with his wife and three children, ages 18, 16 and 15, in the community of Nueva Esperanza in Guaranda canton in the province of Bolivar. He is a member of the rural cooperative Curi-Ñan, located in Nueva Esperanza. The members of this group work in agriculture and livestock.

Pascual raises cattle. He asks for a loan to buy more cattle to raise. His goal is to increase the size of his livestock business. His challenge is disease. In his free time he likes to watch television.

loans.use: to buy cattle to fatten.

loans.name: Nhóm 02 Thôn 10 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Quý has a service business repairing phones. She is applying for a loan to purchase electrical and electronic components to do phone service repairs.

Quý is 24 years old and she is married with 1 child. Quý has been involved in this business for 5 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

She is the group leader of the Nhóm 02 Thôn 10 Quảng Lưu solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. This is Quý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

In the future, Quý hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase electrical and electronic components to do phone service repairs.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es: Liliana vende queso al por mayor y a crédito, a clientes ubicados en el barrio donde habita y tiene su negocio. Ella empezó su vida comercial desde el año 2007, habiendo aprendido de su padre, hombre muy experto en esta tarea y quien le presentó sus primeros clientes. Hoy despues de 7 años, su sueño es mucho mas amplio, porque mas adelante quiere abrir una distribuidora en la ciudad, para aumentar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, que en condicion de separada y cabeza de hogar debe responder personalmente a sus necesidades. El queso lo traes Liliana, desde el departamento del Magdalena y su actividad tiene un gran potencial de crecimeinto, pero la falta de capital de trabajo se presenta como su mayor desafio . Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en mayor volumen queso, para incrementar sus entregas, fortalecer sus ingresos, lo que haría de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Liliana sells cheese at wholesale and on credit to customers located in her neighborhood. She started her business in 2007 having learned from her father, an expert in this work who gave her her first customers. After 7 years, her dreams have gotten much bigger - one day she would like to open a distribution center in the city, in order to improve her family's quality of life. She is separated and is the head of the household, so is responsible for meeting their needs.

Liliana brings cheese from the department of Magdalena and there is a lot of room for growth in her work, but the lack of capital is her biggest challenge. For that reason she asks for a loan from Kiva, her first from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will use it to buy a greater volume of cheese in order to increase her orders and strengthen her income, which will make her loan a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy a greater volume of cheese.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
María tiene 27 años de edad  de estado civil casado vive con su esposo e hijos de 10 y 3 años en el cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar, en la comunidad Vinchoa Grande.
Es integrante de la ventanilla Rural Cooperativa Curi-Ñan  se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad de Vinchoa Grande, esta se dedican a las labores agrícolas y pecuarias.
María se dedica a la agricultura y a la cría de animales. Solicita el crédito para la compra de cerdos y pollos para criarlos y venderlos. Su meta es aumentar su negocio de cría de animales. Su desafío es las enfermedades y el mal tiempo. En su tiempo libre le gusta salir al parque a pasearse con los hijos.
texts.en:
María is 27 years old, married, and lives with with her husband and her children, who are 10 and 3 years old, in the cantón of Guaranda, province of Bolivar, in the community of Vinchoa Grande. 

She is a member of the rural communal bank Curi-Ñan, located in the community of Vinchoa Grande, where the people work in agriculture and livestock. María works in agriculture and raises animals. 

She is requesting the loan to buy pigs and chickens, so she can raise them and sell them. Her goal is to grow her animal raising buisiness. Her challenges are the animals' illnesses and bad weather. In her free time, she likes to go to the park and spend time with her children.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana de 23 años de edad es una mujer que se esfuerza por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que todos los días se levanta desde muy temprano para atender su negocio en el cual vende productos como: mochilas, gorras, squiz, termos, además elabora arreglos para toda ocasión para obtener mejores ganancias, lo que le permite dar mejores condiciones de vida a sus 2 hijos: uno de 5 meses y uno de 2 años de edad, apoyada por su compañero de vida que se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado municipal. Ana tiene el firme deseo de mejorar su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos como: mochilas, camisetas, squiz, peluches, listón, papel de regalo, etc.
texts.en:
Ana, 23, is a woman who works hard to support her family. Every day she gets up very early to attend to her business, in which she sells products such as backpacks, hats, Squiz [soft-drink], thermoses, and also makes arrangements for all occasions to obtain better earnings. This allows her to provide better living conditions for her two children: one five months old and one two years old. 

She is supported by her partner, who makes his living selling vegetables at the municipal market.

Ana has the firm desire to improve her business, for which she requests a FUSAI credit to invest in the purchase of products like backpacks, shirts, Squiz, stuffed animals, ribbon, wrapping paper, etc.

loans.use: to buy backpacks, shirts, Squiz [drink], stuffed animals, ribbon, wrapping paper, etc.

loans.name: Yaolemneere Group

texts.fr:
Mr Silvain est le représentant du groupe YAOLEMNEERE. Il se porte très bien. Marié, il est père de 02 enfants, le plus âgé a05 ans et le moins âge a 18 mois. 01 va à l’école. Il a 03 personnes en charge.
Monsieur est vend des matelas et des rideaux depuis 1 an. Il s’approvisionne auprès des usines. Ses clients sont les habitants son quartier.
Il  veut s’acheter  25 rideaux, 25 coussins.
Mr Silvain veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour réinvestir dans son activité. Il ambitionne ouvrir un magasin de stockage et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Silvain is the representative of the Yaolemneere group. He is in good health. He is married and the father of two children between the ages of 18 months and 5 years. He has three dependents.

He has been selling mattresses and curtains for a year. He buys his supplies from factories. His clients are neighborhood residents.

He would like to buy 25 curtains and 25 cushions.

Mr Silvain would like to reinvest his profits in his business. He would like to open a storage installation and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: buy 25 curtains and 25 cushions.

loans.name: Nhóm 15 Thôn 8 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Thủy is 37 years old and she is married with 3 children.

Thủy operates a small restaurant selling rice noodles. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials (noodle, chicken, beef) to maintain the small restaurant. Thủy has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Thủy is the group leader of the Nhóm 15 Thôn 8 Quảng hải solidarity group, which consists of 8 members. In 2013, Thủy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Thủy has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profits, Thủy hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase materials (noodles, chicken, beef) to maintain a small restaurant.

loans.name: Nhóm 13 Thôn 8 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Xuyến operates a food stall selling meat. She is requesting a loan to purchase pigs to resell meat.

Xuyến is 50 years old and she is married with 2 children. Xuyến is the group leader of the Nhóm 13 Thôn 8 Quảng hải solidarity group, which consists of 8 members. 

This is Xuyến's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Xuyến has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Xuyến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to resell meat.

loans.name: Kinh's Group

texts.en:
Kinh, born in 1972, is a Thai ethnic person. She lives with her husband and her two children -- one son and one daughter -- in Mai Son district, in Son La province.

Her family lives mainly on farming and animal husbandry. After each harvest season, the married couples can save a little money for their children’s education. These expenses for food and education are increasing day by day, so she needs to expand the area of cultivation and the animal husbandry to get a higher income to improve the living conditions of the family and adequately prepare for the children’s higher education.

This season, she hopes to borrow a loan from the program of M7-MFI to buy fertilizer for coffee trees.

She hopes that the loan will help her family’s coffee garden will grow well: she hopes that in the coming harvest season the coffee trees will have many big beans.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for coffee trees

loans.name: Wendtong Group

texts.fr:
Mme LAMOUSSA LIZETA est la représentante du groupe WENDTONG. Elle se porte très bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 13 ans et le moins âgé à 06 mois.  02 vont  à l’école. Elle a 04 personnes en charge.
Madame est commerçante depuis 04 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans le marché de son quartier. Ses clients sont les habitants de son quartier.
Elle  veut s’acheter 02 douzaines de chemises pour  filles, 03 douzaines d’habits de bébé, 03 douzaines de paires de chaussures.
Mme LAMOUSSA LIZETA veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer  son activité. Elle ambitionne ouvrir une boutique de vente d’habits et compte  améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Madame Lamoussa Lizeta is the representative of the Wendtong group. She is in good health. She is married and the mother of four children between the ages of 6 months and 13 years. Two of her children go to school. She has four dependents. 

She has been a shopkeeper for four years. She buys her supplies in the local market. Her clients are residents from her neighborhood. 

She would like to buy two dozen girls' shirts, three dozen baby outfits, and three dozen pairs of shoes.

Madame Lamoussa Lizeta would like to use her profits to strengthen her business. She would like to open a clothing boutique and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: two dozen girls' shirts, three dozen baby outfits, and three dozen pairs of shoes.

loans.name: Lumiere Group

texts.fr:
Mme Rihanata est la représentante du groupe LUMIERE. Elle se porte très bien. Marié, elle est mère de 03 enfants, le plus âgé a 10 ans et le moins âgé a 02 ans.02 vont à l’école. Elle  a 04 personnes en charge.
Madame vend du bois et des céréales  depuis 10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les provinces environnantes. Ses clients sont les habitants de son quartier.
Elle  veut s’acheter 01 rangée de bois et 01 sac de maïs.
Mme Rihanata veut épargner ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité et amélioré les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Madame Rihanata is the representative of the Lumiere group. She is in good health. She is married and the mother of three children between the ages of 2 and 10. She has four dependents.

She has been selling wood and cereals for 10 years. She buys her supplies in the neighboring provinces. Her clients are neighborhood residents. 

She would like to buy one row of wood and one bag of corn.

Madame Rihanata would like to save her profits to strengthen her savings and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: buy one row of wood and one bag of corn.

loans.name: Kusorkan

texts.ru: Кусоркан 59 лет, вдова, есть сын и 2 внучки. У Кусоркан - среднее образование, много лет проработала в пекарне, сейчас на пенсии и с 1996 года занимается сельским хозяйством, обеспечивая семью дополнительным доходом. Благодаря упорному труду Кусоркан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 лошади и 10 овец. Также имеется земельный надел, мерою 4,88 ГА, где Кусоркан выращивает картофель, зерновые культуры и эспарцет. Сын и внуки в свободное время активно помогают по хозяйству, а также в реализации молока. Совокупный ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). Семья берется за любую работу, так как нужно воспитывать и обучать внуков. Доходов катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь и удовлетворение всех нужд семьи, поэтому Кусоркан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, часть средств Кусоркан  планирует направить на закуп корма для скота. Развитие хозяйства позволит увеличить тем самым объемы реализуемого молока. Доходы от кредита позволят Кусоркан развить ее бизнес, улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Kusorkan is 59 years old, a widow, and she has a son and two grandchildren.  She has the equivalent of a high school education and used to work for many years in a bakery shop.  She is now a pensioner, and since 1996, she has been involved in agriculture, an activity which provides an additional income for her family.  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently owns two dairy cows, two horses and ten sheep.  She also has a plot of land measuring 4.88 hectares, on which she grows potatoes, cereals and sainfoin.  In their spare time, her son and grandchildren actively help Kusorkan to run the farm and to sell milk.  Kusorkan makes a total monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS).  The family also takes any odd job, since the grandchildren need to be raised and educated.  Kusorkan's income is vastly insufficient to provide a decent living and to meet all the needs of the family.  For this reason, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will primarily use her loan to purchase livestock, and also to buy some animal feed.  By developing her business, Kusorkan hopes to increase her production of milk for resale.  The earnings from her loan will enable her to expand her business and to improve her family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy additional cattle to increase her milk production, and also to buy feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Thuoi's Group

texts.en:
Thuoi, born in 1981, is a Thai ethnic person. She lives with her husband and her two children in Mai Son district, in Son La province. 

She does farming on her family’s land. Her desire to give her children the chance to go to school to learn is why she always works hard inspite of severe weather.

The new school year is beginning and she is lacking the amount required to pay for her children’s education fees, so she hopes to borrow a loan from M7-MFI to cover these fees. This loan will help her family reduce difficulties and feel secure to study. She will work hard to get the money to repay the institution on time.

loans.use: to pay for her children’s educational fees

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth no esta casada pero tiene dos hijos en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento pero el domicilio esta en malas condiciones, puesto que la humedad ha dejado con rajaduras en las paredes  Ruth  se gana la vida como comerciante y quiere un credito para comprar quintales de linaza, maca y otras semillas que sirven para fabricar alimentos nutritivos Ruth es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar, pero goza de buena salud y tiene muchos deseos de superación.
texts.en:
Ruth is not married but does have two children. She lives in La Paz in a home made of brick and cement, but the house is in poor conditions due to the humidity which has left cracks in the walls.

Ruth earns a living as a merchant and she wants a loan to buy large quantities of flax seed, maca and other seeds that are used to make nutritious foods. Ruth is the only source of income in her home, but she is in good health and has a great desire to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of flax seed, maca y and other seeds used to make nutritious foods.

loans.name: Nhóm 13 Thôn 10 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Năng operates a food stall selling fish. She is applying for a loan to purchase equipment to catch fish to sell.

Năng is 55 years old and she is married with 3 children. Năng is the group leader of the Nhóm 13 thôn 10 Quảng Hả solidarity group, which consists of 4 members.
